rules_text:
Deathtouch, reach
[i]Mage Ring[/i] – The first spell you cast each turn has replicate {B}{B}{B}
[i]Sophisticate[/i] – If you would draw a card, instead exile the top three cards of your library and put on of them into your hand.
[i]Medusa[/i] – {B}{G}, {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.
